title: Freshness Guarantee
content: We stand behind the quality of our products. If you're not satisfied with the freshness of any item, we'll replace it or refund your money, no questions asked. Perishable items are inspected daily and rotated to ensure optimal freshness. Produce is delivered fresh multiple times per week. Meat and seafood are cut fresh daily. Check 'best by' dates on all packaged goods.

title: Delivery Policy
content: We offer same-day delivery for orders placed before 2 PM. Standard delivery windows are 2 hours. You can choose your preferred delivery window at checkout. Delivery fee is $5.99 for orders under $50, free for orders $50 and above. Temperature-sensitive items are transported in insulated bags with ice packs. Someone must be present to receive perishable orders. Leave detailed delivery instructions if needed.

title: Substitution Policy
content: If an item you ordered is out of stock, we'll contact you with a substitution option. You can set your substitution preferences in your account: accept similar items, accept same brand only, or no substitutions. Substitutions are always equal or greater value at no extra charge. You can reject any substitution at delivery for a full refund on that item. Mark specific items as 'no substitution' in your cart.

title: Return & Refund Policy
content: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase for non-perishable items with receipt. Perishable items cannot be returned but are covered by our Freshness Guarantee. To request a refund, contact customer service or use the app. Refunds are processed within 3-5 business days to the original payment method. Damaged or incorrect items will be refunded or replaced immediately upon report.
